0: Tom Cruise & Suri Daddy Chauffeur Reporting for Duty NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR Breaking News NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR looked just like any other dad -- who's world famous and watched by dozens of paparazzi -- as he took his daughter to gymnastics moments ago in NYC.had her head buried in Tom's shoulder as they left the Greenwich Hotel, and walked through a gauntlet of photogs and fans to get to their SUV.Cameras were also waiting as they arrived a few minutes later at Chelsea Piers for Suri's gymnastics class.Father and daughter had a full day of QT to catch up at his hotel
